alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 27 at 3:36AM MST until December 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Blowing snow in any snow showers. * WHERE...White Mountains and locations along and downwind of the Mogollon Rim. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Reduced visibility in areas of blowing snow Monday night into Tuesday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
